TopicTitle: Transfer of science experiments between DOCKED craft.

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if this is possible, or even in the game already, got to thinking, why design a ship that has to come back as well when I can design a designated runner ship to shuttle experiments back to Kerbin. I see no reason this is unrealistic.

I value others opinions/ informing me on status of this (Already in, not possible ect)
Kerbals can transfer experiments while on EVA already. We'll probably get something specific for docked craft once enhanced IVAs is figured out.
